testcase.name: Verify if Place is being Successfully Added using AddPlaceAPI - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Add Place Payload with "Aindrila" "Bengali" "Barrackpore".............passed When user calls "addPlaceApi" with "Post" http request......................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed And "scope" in response body is "APP".......................................passed And verify placeID created maps to "Aindrila" using "getPlaceApi"...........passed

testcase.name: Verify if Delete Place Functionality is working
testcase.system-out: Given DeletePlace Payload...................................................passed When user calls "deletePlaceApi" with "Post" http request...................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed
